channel.title: «PI» Character file doesnt work?
channel.description:
So i just logged in on a new source i'm using, and so i just logged out to see my character files and putting my rights to 3, but i don't see my own character standing in the character file. So i decided to log-in on a other account to test wether i could change something on there, the character files are perfectly ok. whenever i change something, it doesn't change it in-game. For example, i tried to give a other account character rights 2 instead of 0, and nothing changed. I tried to give that same character 1000 pk points, didn't happen. Could any of you please help me?
Using this server
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,511978.0.html

item.title: «PI» Character file doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @Zentior Zentior
item.description:
@Zentior wrote:

So i just logged in on a new source i’m using, and so i just logged out to see my character files and putting my rights to 3, but i don’t see my own character standing in the character file. So i decided to log-in on a other account to test wether i could change something on there, the character files are perfectly ok. whenever i change something, it doesn’t change it in-game. For example, i tried to give a other account character rights 2 instead of 0, and nothing changed. I tried to give that same character 1000 pk points, didn’t happen. Could any of you please help me?
